mean_en: pieces of writing that are valued as works of art, especially novels, plays and poems (in contrast to technical books and newspapers, magazines, etc.)
sentence: The professor is giving a lecture on modern Chinese literature.
sentence_trans: 教授正在进行一场有关中国现代文学的讲座。
word_etyma: litera=letter文字，字母 + ture状态 → 文字状态 → literature文学
